BiqhTableMaps.SqlQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT
	r.SegmentType AS [ProviderKey],
	r.SegmentType AS [Name]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.ClassificationType b_classificati ON b_classificati.Code = N'Segment' AND b_classificati.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.CompanyIdentifier AS [ProviderKey],
	r.CompanyIdentifier AS [OwnProviderId],
	r.CompanySymbol AS [Symbol],
	r.ParentScoringNumber AS [Symbol]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.Company b_company ON b_company.ParentCompanyId = NULL AND b_company.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.ClimateChangeExposureGrade AS [ProviderKey],
	r.ClimateChangeExposureGrade AS [ClimateChangeExposureGrade],
	r.LowCarbonTransitionExposureGrade AS [LowCarbonTransitionExposureGrade],
	r.GhgEmissionsScope1 AS [GhgEmissionsScope1],
	r.GhgEmissionsScope2 AS [GhgEmissionsScope2],
	r.GhgEmissionsScope2Source AS [GhgEmissionsScope2Source],
	r.GhgEmissionsScope3 AS [GhgEmissionsScope3],
	r.CustomerETransitoryEmissionsTotal AS [GhgEmissionsTotal],
	r.CustomerETransitoryWaterTotal AS [WaterEmissionsTotal],
	r.CustomerETransitoryWasteTotal AS [HazardousWasteProduction]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.SustainabilityReport b_sustainabili ON b_sustainabili.EnvironmentalSustainabilityId = NULL AND b_sustainabili.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.TotalGrade AS [ProviderKey],
	r.TotalGrade AS [TotalGrade],
	r.EnvironmentalGrade AS [EnvironmentalGrade],
	r.SocialGrade AS [SocialGrade],
	r.GovernanceGrade AS [GovernanceGrade],
	r.ApprovedDate AS [EndDateTime]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.CorpGovernanceQualitative_LegalRisk AS [ProviderKey],
	r.CorpGovernanceQualitative_LegalRisk AS [GovernancePillarRisk],
	r.CorpGovernanceQualitative_LegalRiskReason AS [GovernancePillarRiskNote]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.SustainabilityReport b_sustainabili ON b_sustainabili.GovernanceSustainabilityId = NULL AND b_sustainabili.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.FloodRiskTotal AS [FloodTotal],
	r.FloodRiskRiver AS [RiverFlood],
	r.FloodRiskCoast AS [CoastalFlood],
	r.HeatWaveTotal AS [HeatStressTotal]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.IndicationsTransitoryRisk AS [ProviderKey],
	r.IndicationsTransitoryRisk AS [Transition],
	r.IndicationsTransitoryRiskReason AS [TransitionNote],
	r.Tornado AS [Tornado],
	r.ExtratropicalStorm AS [ExtratropicalStorm],
	r.Hail AS [Hail],
	r.Lightning AS [Lightning],
	r.Wildfire AS [Wildfire],
	r.FlashFlood AS [FlashFlood],
	r.CoastalFlood AS [CoastalFlood],
	r.TropicalCycloneYear AS [TropicalCycloneYear],
	r.TropicalCyclone AS [TropicalCyclone],
	r.DroughtStressYear AS [DroughtStressYear],
	r.DroughtStress AS [DroughtStress],
	r.FireWeatherStressIndexYear AS [FireWeatherStressIndexYear],
	r.FireWeatherStressIndex AS [FireWeatherStressIndex],
	r.HeatStressYear AS [HeatStressYear],
	r.HeatStress AS [HeatStress],
	r.ColdStressYear AS [ColdStressYear],
	r.ColdStress AS [ColdStress],
	r.PrecipitationYear AS [PrecipitationYear],
	r.Precipitation AS [Precipitation],
	r.RiverFloodYear AS [RiverFloodYear],
	r.RiverFlood AS [RiverFlood],
	r.SeaLevelRiseYear AS [SeaLevelRiseYear],
	r.SeaLevelRise AS [SeaLevelRise],
	r.IndicationsPhysicalRisk AS [Physical],
	r.IndicationsPhysicalRiskReason AS [PhysicalNote],
	r.IndicationsSocialRisk AS [Social],
	r.IndicationsSocialRiskReason AS [SocialNote],
	r.IndicationsGovernanceRisk AS [Governance],
	r.IndicationsGovernanceRiskReason AS [GovernanceNote],
	r.TotalRiskAfterRelevanceRounded AS [Total]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.ObjectRiskCategory b_objectriskca ON b_objectriskca.Code = N'General' AND b_objectriskca.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.CorpSocialQualitative_LegalRisk AS [ProviderKey],
	r.CorpSocialQualitative_LegalRisk AS [SocialPillarRisk],
	r.CorpSocialQualitative_LegalRiskReason AS [SocialPillarRiskNote]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.SustainabilityReport b_sustainabili ON b_sustainabili.SocialSustainabilityId = NULL AND b_sustainabili.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	r.LegalRisk AS [ProviderKey],
	r.LegalRisk AS [LegalRisk],
	r.LegalRiskNote AS [LegalRiskNote]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.Statement b_statement ON b_statement.SustainabilityReportId = NULL AND b_statement.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

-- Relation table [SustainabilityReport] is referenced for filtering; add concrete mapping if needed.
SELECT DISTINCT
	-- TODO: map columns for [SustainabilityReport] if needed
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r
WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

SELECT DISTINCT
	b_.Id AS [-Id],
	b_classificati.Id AS [ClassificationId],
	b_company.Id AS [CompanyId],
	b_environmenta.Id AS [EnvironmentalSustainabilityId],
	b_esg.Id AS [EsgId],
	b_governancesu.Id AS [GovernanceSustainabilityId],
	b_objectrisk.Id AS [ObjectRiskId],
	b_socialsustai.Id AS [SocialSustainabilityId],
	b_sustainabili.Id AS [SustainabilityReportId]
FROM
	@Schema.CompanyEsg r 

	INNER JOIN dbo.- b_ ON b_.ProviderKey = r.OtherReason AND b_.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.Classification b_classificati ON b_classificati.ProviderKey = r.SegmentType AND b_classificati.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.Company b_company ON b_company.ProviderKey = r.CompanyIdentifier AND b_company.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.EnvironmentalSustainability b_environmenta ON b_environmenta.ProviderKey = r.ClimateChangeExposureGrade AND b_environmenta.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.Esg b_esg ON b_esg.ProviderKey = r.TotalGrade AND b_esg.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.GovernanceSustainability b_governancesu ON b_governancesu.ProviderKey = r.CorpGovernanceQualitative_LegalRisk AND b_governancesu.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.ObjectRisk b_objectrisk ON b_objectrisk.ProviderKey = r.IndicationsTransitoryRisk AND b_objectrisk.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.SocialSustainability b_socialsustai ON b_socialsustai.ProviderKey = r.CorpSocialQualitative_LegalRisk AND b_socialsustai.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.SustainabilityReport b_sustainabili ON b_sustainabili.ProviderKey = r.LegalRisk AND b_sustainabili.ProviderId = @ProviderId

WHERE
	r.Record_ImportId = @ImportId
	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

	INNER JOIN dbo.Esg b_esg ON b_esg.ProviderKey = r.TotalGrade AND b_esg.ProviderId = @ProviderId

	INNER JOIN dbo.ObjectRisk b_objectrisk ON b_objectrisk.ProviderKey = r.IndicationsTransitoryRisk AND b_objectrisk.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.SocialSustainability b_socialsustai ON b_socialsustai.ProviderKey = r.CorpSocialQualitative_LegalRisk AND b_socialsustai.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.SustainabilityReport b_sustainabili ON b_sustainabili.ProviderKey = r.LegalRisk AND b_sustainabili.ProviderId = @ProviderId

	AND r.Record_HasError = 0

	INNER JOIN dbo.Classification b_classificati ON b_classificati.ProviderKey = r.SegmentType AND b_classificati.ProviderId = @ProviderId
	INNER JOIN dbo.Company b_company ON b_company.ProviderKey = r.CompanyIdentifier AND b_company.ProviderId = @ProviderId
